definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: Results show that PCE is degraded by reductive dechlorination.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，PCE是通过还原脱氯发生生物降解的。

sentences.english: Biodegradable poly(L - aspartic acid) hydrogels were synthesized by a two - step cross- linking reaction .
sentences.chinese: 采用两步交联法合成了可生物降解聚天冬氨酸水凝胶。

sentences.english: We need biodegradable products that if dumped, will simply disintegrate within a few weeks.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要可以在丢弃后数周内即被生物降解的材料。
难治性物质的抗生物降解。

sentences.english: Whilst being fossil fuel-based, AACs are biodegradable and compostable.
sentences.chinese: 虽然是化石燃料为基础，可生物降解和堆肥气冷。

sentences.english: The methods of the test of the bio-degradability of the plastics are introduced in this article.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了目前国内外常用的检测塑料生物降解的方法。

sentences.english: Lighter the crude oil is, faster will it be biodegraded.
sentences.chinese: 原油的油质越轻，生物降解的速度越快。

sentences.english: It is not biodegradable or compostable but it is recyclable.
sentences.chinese: 虽然不能生物降解或者堆肥，但是可以回收再利用。

sentences.english: Biodegradation. Can decompose to carbon dioxide, biomass and water.
sentences.chinese: 生物降解，可分解成二氧化碳，有机物和水。

sentences.english: The results showed that PELA is a new biodegradable copolymer.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明PELA是一种新型生物降解材料。

sentences.english: They consist of regrowing raw materials and are biodegradable at 100%.
sentences.chinese: 它们包括再生的原材料，可以被100%的生物降解。

sentences.english: Most of the world oil has been biodegraded.
sentences.chinese: 全球石油大多遭受过生物降解。

sentences.english: Evaluation of the elimination and biodegradability of organic compounds in an aqueous medium.
sentences.chinese: 水介质中有机化合物的清除和生物降解性的评价。

sentences.english: An adsorption biodegradation process was used to treat brewery industrial waste water.
sentences.chinese: 采用吸附生物降解工艺处理啤酒废水。

sentences.english: Biodegradation was the main way of the oil contaminants removal.
sentences.chinese: 生物降解是石油污染物去除的主要途径。

sentences.english: Development and use of the paper film made of plant fibers can produce good biodegradability.
sentences.chinese: 开发使用植物纤维作纸地膜具有良好的生物降解性。
